snippet: The incumbent, Sepp Blatter, and three rivals — Prince Ali bin al-Hussein of Jordan, Michael van Praag of the Netherlands and the former Portugal great Luis Figo — are in contention.
abstract: Jordan's Prince Ali bin al-Hussein, Michael van Praag of the Netherlands and Luis Figo of Portugal are being vetted to become formal challengers to FIFA president Sepp Blatter; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The incumbent, Sepp Blatter, and three rivals — Prince Ali bin al-Hussein of Jordan, Michael van Praag of the Netherlands and the former Portugal great Luis Figo — are in contention.

headline.main: Four Are Finalists for FIFA Presidency
headline.print_headline: Four Are Finalists for FIFA Presidency

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Ali bin al-Hussein, Prince of Jordan
